name: Taiga Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Taiga Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Taiga events via webhook

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

resources.name: resources
resources.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resources | 作用: Resources to listen to | 默认值: ['all'] | (必填项)

operations.name: operations
operations.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operations | 作用: Operations to listen to | 默认值: ['all'] | (必填项)
